snippet.title: Minecraft Dungeons Diaries: Howling Peaks DLC
snippet.description: This edition of Minecraft Dungeons Diaries gives you a sneak peek of our upcoming free update and Howling Peaks DLC, which includes Apocalypse Plus. Despite the warm and fuzzy name, this adds difficulty levels to your game for those of you who want more of a challenge. The team also walk you through the Season Pass, cross-play, new content, and introduce you to a new adorable mob!
